verbs.description: [ARG0: The former president] , [V: speaking] [ARGM-LOC: at Liberty University 's commencement] [ARGM-TMP: on Saturday] , remarked on the amount of students and guests in attendance . It was more crowded , he noted , than when Trump delivered the graduation speech at the Virginia school last year .
